statements: SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT description FROM financial_transactions WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE user_id = 3 AND transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, description FROM financial_transactions WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE user_id = 54321
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE description LIKE '%withdrawal%'
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, log_description FROM financial_transactions JOIN audit_logs ON financial_transactions.transaction_id = audit_logs.transaction_id WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount ASC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_type FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'Withdrawal' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC

SELECT ft.transaction_id, al.log_description FROM financial_transactions ft INNER JOIN audit_logs al ON ft.transaction_id = al.transaction_id WHERE al.log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT COUNT(*) as num_transactions, AVG(transaction_amount) as avg_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY transaction_type HAVING AVG(transaction_amount) > 500
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM transaction_categories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT audit_date, auditor_name FROM transaction_audit WHERE audit_result = 'passed';
SELECT AVG(amount) FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;

SELECT ft.transaction_id, ft.amount, tc.category_name FROM financial_transactions ft LEFT JOIN transaction_categories tc ON ft.transaction_id = tc.category_id WHERE tc.category_name LIKE '%expenses%';

SELECT ft.transaction_id, ft.amount, ta.auditor_name FROM financial_transactions ft JOIN transaction_audit ta ON ft.transaction_id = ta.transaction_id WHERE ta.auditor_name = 'John Doe' AND ft.amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;

SELECT ft.transaction_id, ft.amount, ta.audit_date FROM financial_transactions ft JOIN transaction_audit ta ON ft.transaction_id = ta.transaction_id WHERE ta.audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM account_details ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action, user_id, description FROM audit_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM account_details WHERE balance > 10000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE role = 'admin' LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, category, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE category IN ('Food', 'Shopping') ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action, user_id FROM audit_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_type FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, AVG(account_balance) AS average_balance FROM accounts GROUP BY account_id HAVING AVG(account_balance) > 5000;
SELECT * FROM auditors WHERE auditor_department = 'Finance';
SELECT transaction_id, log_description FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE account_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_holder, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings' LIMIT 10;
SELECT auditor_name, auditor_department FROM auditors WHERE LENGTH(auditor_name) > 10 ORDER BY auditor_department ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, log_description FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND log_timestamp <= '2022-06-30 23:59:59';
SELECT transaction_id, auditor_id, audit_result FROM audit_trail WHERE audit_date > '2022-03-01' AND audit_date < '2022-03-31';
